physical_form.properties: Lightweight, recyclable, provides cushioning and stacking strength.
physical_form.application: Outer box for bulk packaging and shipping.

physical_form.properties: Stiff, thin, provides separation and prevents scratching.
physical_form.application: Interleaving between tiles within a box.

physical_form.properties: Strong, tear-resistant, acts as a void fill and wrapping material.
physical_form.application: Wrapping individual stacks of tiles or filling gaps in the box.

physical_form.properties: Elastic, conforms to shape, provides containment and dust protection.
physical_form.application: Wrapping entire pallet loads of boxed tiles.

physical_form.properties: High tensile strength, secures pallet loads, resists breakage.
Rigid, protects edges from impact and strapping damage.
physical_form.application: Reinforcing the corners of pallet loads.

physical_form.properties: Recycled content, form-fitting, protects corners and edges.

physical_form.application: Individual tile protection (for very high-value tiles).

fragility.properties: High crush resistance, protects against impacts.
fragility.application: Outer box for shipping, providing maximum protection.

fragility.properties: Excellent shock absorption, conforms to tile shape.
fragility.application: Cradling individual tiles for superior protection.
Wrapping individual tiles or stacks of tiles.

fragility.properties: Void fill, conforms to space, cushions against impacts.
fragility.application: Filling empty spaces within the box to prevent tile movement.

fragility.properties: Suspends tiles in the center of the box, absorbing shocks.
fragility.application: Specialized packaging for extremely fragile or high-value tiles.

fragility.properties: High tensile strength, prevents box rupture.
Protects edges and corners from impact and abrasion.
Conforms to shape, protects against vibration.
Recycled and recyclable, provides separation and cushioning
Fills empty spaces, preventing movement and breakage.

shelf_life.properties: Protects from moisture and dust during storage.
shelf_life.application: Wrapping stacks of tiles or pallets.

shelf_life.properties: Protects from sunlight degradation during outdoor storage.
shelf_life.application: Wrapping pallets for long-term outdoor storage.

shelf_life.properties: Absorbs moisture, preventing mold and mildew.
shelf_life.application: Included inside the box to control humidity.
Wrapping metallic tiles to prevent rust.

shelf_life.properties: Controls the atmosphere around the tiles to prevent degradation.
shelf_life.application: Specialized packaging for certain tile types.

shelf_life.properties: Prevents static electricity build-up that can damage some tiles.
shelf_life.application: Wrapping tiles that are sensitive to static.

shelf_life.properties: Provides protection against moisture, oxygen, and light.
Replaces oxygen with nitrogen to prevent oxidation.
shelf_life.application: Used with barrier films for extended shelf life.
Storage of tiles in controlled environments.

chemical_properties.properties: Resistant to acids and alkalis, provides a barrier.
chemical_properties.application: Liners or containers to protect against chemical damage.

chemical_properties.properties: Chemically inert, prevents reaction with tiles.
Prevents chemical reactions with sensitive tile surfaces.
Does not react with most chemicals, durable.
Provides a protective layer against chemical exposure.
Blocks the transmission of harmful vapors.
chemical_properties.application: Wrapping materials to protect from external chemical exposure.
Integrated into packaging for sensitive tiles.

chemical_properties.properties: Prevents corrosion from occurring within the packaging.
chemical_properties.application: Used in plastic films and containers.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inhibits the growth of bacteria and fungi.
Maintains a sterile environment for tiles.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Packaging for specialized tiles used in cleanrooms or hospitals.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Resists dirt and grime buildup, easy to sanitize.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: External packaging for tiles in high-hygiene areas.
Ensuring cleanliness during transit and storage.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Sterilized through radiation, eliminating all microorganisms.
Indicates if the packaging has been opened or compromised.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Ensuring the integrity of the hygienic environment.
Packaging that is sterilized with UV-C light.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Manufactured and packaged in a cleanroom environment.
hygiene_sensitivity.application: For tiles used in sensitive environments.

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Inhibits bacterial growth on the packaging surface.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Maintains a stable temperature inside the package.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Protecting tiles from extreme temperature fluctuations.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Changes color to indicate temperature exposure.
Absorbs or releases heat to maintain a specific temperature range.
Reflects radiant heat, keeping the contents cooler.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Lining boxes to reduce heat absorption.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Maintains a precise temperature during shipping.
temperature_sensitivity.application: For tiles requiring strict temperature control.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: High insulation value with minimal thickness.
temperature_sensitivity.application: Insulating boxes for extreme temperature protection.

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Maintains a cold temperature inside the package.
Provides insulation and protection from extreme temperatures.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Certified to meet UN standards for transporting hazardous materials.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Packaging for tiles containing volatile or hazardous substances.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Clearly identifies the hazards associated with the contents.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Adhered to the outside of the packaging.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: An additional layer of protection to prevent leaks or spills.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Inner bags or containers within the main box.
Packaging materials for tiles that are flammable.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Prevents static electricity buildup that could ignite flammable vapors.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: For tiles containing flammable liquids or gases.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Provides detailed information about the hazardous materials.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: Included inside a waterproof pouch attached to the packaging.

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Indicates if the packaging has been opened and warns of potential hazards.
Releases excess pressure to prevent explosions.
volatility_or_hazard_risk.application: For tiles that may release gases under certain conditions.

visibility_and_display.properties: Allows partial visibility of the tile while providing protection.
Showcases multiple tiles in an attractive manner.
Features product information, branding, and images.
Allows tiles to be hung on retail displays.
Links to product information and promotions.
Enhances the customer experience through digital content.
Focuses on showcasing the tile with minimal distraction.
Easy access and clear view of the tiles.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Indicates the exact number of tiles inside.
Allows for easy stacking and storage of multiple boxes.
Allows for easy removal of individual tiles.

For very high-value tiles or those needing strict protection.

quantity_and_dosage.properties: Allows for easy estimation of tile quantity.
Ensures accurate tile count based on weight.
Quickly and efficiently packages tiles in specific quantities.
Contains a set number of tiles for convenient retail display.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Indicates if the package has been opened or compromised.
Leaves a visible residue when removed.
Each package has a unique identifier for tracking and tracing.
Allows for electronic tracking of packages.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.application: Deterring theft by obscuring the item.

value_and_theft_sensitivity.properties: Makes it difficult to open or tamper with the package.
Alerts to unauthorized opening of the package.
Deters theft and provides evidence in case of loss.
Provides financial protection in case of theft or damage.
